messages.title: Our Conservative Councils will demonstrate how we will run the country.
messages.content: By their mismanagement the Conservative Council has plunged the City into financial crisis

messages.title: Will your Children's Centre close?
messages.content: The Tories have pledged to slash the Sure Start budget by £200 million. They will close one in five centres. Don't let the Tories put at risk the future wellbeing of our local children.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Free city centre bus AXED, Leisure card AXED, Meals on wheels charges almost DOUBLED, Grave lease fees DOUBLED, with increases in cremation fees and interment fees, Underhill Old People's Home CLOSED, 5 out of the 21 Branch libraries CLOSED, Day Care Centres CLOSING, Community Centres CLOSED, Youth provision SLASHED
£370 million Labour Government funding earmarked to build new Schools for the City. Additional £280 million Labour Government INVESTMENT

issues.economy: By their mismanagement the Conservative Council has plunged the City into financial crisis
issues.governance: Can you trust them with the country's finances?
issues.socialWelfare: The Tories have pledged to slash the Sure Start budget by £200 million

quotes.text: Over 500,000 residents in the West Midlands have free pensioner bus passes. Will free bus passes be safe from planned Tory funding cuts?

images.caption: Will your child's school still be improved?
